ResourceHeader.ResourceName: HUSAFELL: DC Magnetometer Ground Based Data (PNG)
ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains plots of DC magnetic field from the Husafell ground station in VDH system. V (Z) is the output vertical, D is the horizontal component to the East, H is the horizontal component to the North. Amplitude in Gamma (1 Gamma= 1nT) is given on the left, at the tick mark, scale of amplitude is indicated.
